text: Crosswords DS (also known as CrossworDS) is a crosswords video game made by Nuevo Retro Games and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS game console. It has three games - Crosswords, Word search, and Anagrams. ==Other websites== * IGN web page for Crosswords DS Category:2008 video games Category:2012 video games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Nintendo Software Technology games Category:Puzzle video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Crosswords DS
